job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Lead experimental design to test business use cases, analysis of experiment results and development & deployment of advanced data science models – propensity, uplift predictive. Resource expected to be able to successfully complete tasks independently.

Required Skills:

- Experimental Design
- Deep understanding of Data Science models
- Experience deploying Propensity & Uplift Models
- Advanced statistical knowledge (Bayesian methods, causal inference)
- Python Development
- PySpark
- ML Framework is a plus
- NLP experience is a plus
